name: Bookmarks Manager
description: A simple notion page to store all your important links, URLs, and bookmarks.The days of worrying about where to save links are long gone.Not now,This template is for anyone who finds it tough to store the important links, URLs, bookmarks, resources, and more.From site links to Twitter conversations, YouTube videos to articles, you can share/save your critical link to the notion page.You can sort the tab to view links with different tagsAnd by the search, you can search for the link.With this tem
features: It sure does!. Just duplicate the template & start using it; Guide Included.; No. This product has a personal license.
